messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] letting go of limits/video games
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/7/03 1:52:29 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... It is so nice when no one gasps when you tell them what your child has done. My boys like the
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/7/03 1:52:29 PM Eastern Standard Time,
mummyone24@... writes:

> <<Oh ugh. I would have a really, really hard time with that one.
> I don't know if I could have done what you did....anyone else? That was the
>
> ultimate test of trust......you passed with flying colors!>>
>
>
>

It is so nice when no one gasps when you tell them what your child has done.
My boys like the more violent computer games at times. They like the Duke
Nukem and Doom CD ROMs. And the same way... they play for a while and loose
interest and go back to Age of Mythology, Zoo Tycoon and Civilization. I
just think it is a great forum when you can talk about that and not have
people think you are such an unfit parent for letting your child see such a
"horrible" thing.
Pam G.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
